name: Dumbbell Goblet Squat
description: Hold dumbbell at chest height, squat to parallel depth while maintaining upright torso.

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
description: Stand inside hexagonal bar, grip handles, lift with neutral grip while maintaining neutral spine.

name: Romanian Deadlift (Dumbbell)
description: Hip hinge with slight knee bend, lower dumbbells to mid-shin with controlled eccentric (3-second lowering).

name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
description: Stand on one leg, hinge at hip while holding dumbbells, extend opposite leg behind for balance.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: Rear foot elevated on bench, front leg performs squat motion with dumbbells at sides.

name: Reverse Lunge
description: Step backward into lunge position, lower back knee toward ground, return to standing.

name: Walking Lunge
description: Alternating forward lunges covering distance, maintaining upright torso throughout.

name: Step-Ups
description: Step onto elevated surface, drive through heel, fully extend hip at top.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on back with knees bent, drive hips upward by squeezing glutes, hold briefly at top.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
description: Bridge variation performed on one leg, opposite leg extended straight.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Upper back on bench, drive hips upward with weight across hips, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Dumbbell Single-Arm Row
description: One hand on bench for support, row dumbbell with opposite arm, pulling elbow back and up.

name: Chest-Supported Dumbbell Row
description: Lie prone on incline bench, row both dumbbells simultaneously toward hips.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Row
description: Hip hinge position, row both dumbbells simultaneously toward lower ribs/hips.

name: Inverted Row
description: Hang from bar at waist height with body straight, pull chest to bar.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: Seated position, pull cable handle to torso while maintaining upright posture.

name: Pull-Ups or Lat Pulldown
description: Pull-ups: hang from bar, pull body until chin over bar. Lat pulldown: pull bar to upper chest.

name: Face Pulls
description: Cable at face height, pull rope toward face while externally rotating shoulders.

name: Pallof Press
description: Cable at chest height, press out while resisting rotation, maintain squared shoulders.

name: Dead Bug
description: Lie on back, opposite arm and leg extend while maintaining neutral spine.

name: RKC Plank
description: Standard plank with maximal total body tension - pull elbows closer, squeeze glutes maximally.

name: Side Plank
description: On side, hold body straight from feet to head, supported by forearm and feet.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
description: Kneel, roll wheel forward maintaining neutral spine, return to start position.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
description: Hang from bar, raise knees to chest with control, lower with control.

name: Standing Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Press dumbbells overhead while standing, maintaining neutral spine and engaged core.

name: Landmine Press
description: Barbell in corner or landmine, press at angle with one or two hands.

name: Standard Push-Up
description: Hands shoulder-width, lower chest to ground maintaining straight body, push back up.

name: Incline Push-Up
description: Hands on elevated surface, perform push-up with reduced load.

name: Pike Push-Up
description: Hips high in inverted V position, perform push-up emphasizing shoulders.

name: External Rotation
description: Elbow at side bent 90 degrees, rotate forearm outward against resistance.
